## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                 | Type      | Default         |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------- |
| `contentfulId` | `contentful-id` | Unique identifier for likeable resource                     | `string`  | `undefined`     |
| `count`        | `count`         | Total number of hearts                                      | `number`  | `undefined`     |
| `isLiked`      | `is-liked`      | Boolean indicating whether likeable resource has been liked | `boolean` | `undefined`     |
| `storageKey`   | `storage-key`   | Cache key for localStorage                                  | `string`  | `'crds-hearts'` |
